items.sentence: Tom says he doesn't think that it'll be possible to do that.
Don't you think that we should let Tom try doing that again?
I think that we have enough time to finish doing that today.
Tom was wearing an apron with the image of a pinecone on it.
That's not the main reason that Tom doesn't want to do that.
Tom is the only person in our office who can't speak French.
Tom didn't break everything, but he broke almost everything.
Tom was awakened in the middle of the night by a loud noise.
This is where I pitched my tent the last time I stayed here.
You won't be able to fit all those clothes in your suitcase.
